scripts.dev:build: rm -rf build && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs && cp manifest.json build && cat src/styles.css build/main.css > build/styles.css && rm build/main.css && touch build/.hotreload
scripts.build: rm -rf build && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json build && minify src/styles.css build/main.css > build/styles.css && rm build/main.css
